api_description: Activates the oven at the last selected temperature.

safety.name: PowerOutage
safety.description: High instantaneous power. The execution may cause power outage.

privacy.name: LogEnergyConsumption
privacy.description: The execution allows the app to register information about energy consumption.

financial.name: ElectricEnergyConsumption
